step_data.thought: We have navigated to the 'Shipments' tab within the 'Sales' section, but the page still does not display the option to configure columns. The current page layout shows a grid of shipment details, and there is no dropdown or button to customize the columns. Given this, the most appropriate action is to click on the 'Columns' button located in the main area of the page, as it might provide the option to configure the displayed columns.
